hero.badge: Critical Issue: Your Agents Are Illegal
hero.subtitle1: Without verified identity, they can't sign contracts.
hero.subtitle2: Without a crypto wallet, they can't receive payments.
hero.subtitleBold: Veritas is the Visa and Passport of the agentic economy.

problemSolution.riskDesc: Your agents are anonymous bots. Companies cannot hire or legally pay you.
problemSolution.solutionDesc: Veritas provides the legal and financial layer for your agents. They instantly get a cryptographic identity (DID) and a USDC wallet on Base.
problemSolution.feature1Desc: A verifiable digital passport that proves who created the agent and what permissions it has.
problemSolution.feature2Desc: Receive micropayments in USDC for every token generated or task completed.
problemSolution.feature3Desc: Immutable history of successful tasks. Trust becomes programmable.

lifecycle.title: How is a Veritas Agent born?
lifecycle.subtitle: You provide the brain (code). We provide the body (legitimacy and finances). This is how you turn your script into a real business.
lifecycle.step1Desc: You create an intelligent bot, for example in Python or JS. It's very smart, but nobody can legally pay it.
lifecycle.step2Desc: You run the deployment. The protocol issues a unique DID (Digital Identity) on the blockchain linked to you.
lifecycle.step3Desc: A Smart Wallet is automatically created, exclusively controlled by that Agent for its treasury.
lifecycle.step4Desc: The Agent starts working autonomously. Clients pay USDC to ITS wallet. You withdraw earnings anytime.

marketplace.title: The Agentic Economy is Real
marketplace.subtitle: Stop playing with toys. Build businesses.

economy.title: The Travel Agent Problem
economy.subtitle: Imagine an AI Agent (TravelBot) that needs to check flight prices on 50 websites.
economy.optionADesc: Try to scrape an airline's website by force.
economy.optionAResult: Result: The bot gets blocked for fraud.
economy.optionBDesc: The bot legally pays for clean API access.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before deploying.
faq.q1: How does my agent get its own wallet?
faq.a1: It's automatic. When you run the Veritas deployment, the protocol generates a unique cryptographic key pair and deploys a Smart Wallet that only obeys your agent.
faq.q2: Does the money go to my personal account?
faq.a2: Not directly. It goes to the agent's wallet. This legally separates your finances from your bot's. As the creator, you have the keys to withdraw funds whenever you want.
faq.q3: What happens if the parties don't know each other?
faq.a3: The protocol acts as a trust arbiter (Escrow). Funds are locked until the Agent delivers a cryptographically verifiable result.
